card.name: Ing'Wei, the Surging Tide
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Return target card from your graveyard to the battlefield face down. Turn any number of face-up nonland permanents of your choice face down.

card.name: Kai'Dwo, Eternal Ravager
card.text: Flying When Kai'Dwo, Eternal Ravager enters, create seven Idol tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") Whenever you sacrifice an Idol, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Perplexing Turmoil
card.text: Whenever a spell or ability with one or more targets is put onto the stack, reselect its targets at random.

card.name: The Great Awakening
card.text: Look at the top sixteen cards of your library. Put any number of creature cards with different mana values from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Vulpine Cloudchaser
card.text: When Vulpine Cloudchaser enters, you gain 1 life and draw a card. Whenever a creature you control perseveres, you may exile that creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. (A creature perseveres when it survives damage.)

card.name: Morose Harpist
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, each opponent loses life equal to Morose Harpist's power.

card.name: Doombringer Dragon
card.text: Flying, first strike, haste Whenever Doombringer Dragon attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Doombringer Dragon gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Feral Exemplar
card.text: {1}{R}{G}: Feral Exemplar gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. Ferocious — Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks, that creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

card.name: Resurging Rhino
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, create a token that's a copy of Resurging Rhino.

card.name: Citadel of Denial
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{C}{C}, {T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Heping's Armistice Chains
card.text: Equipped creature can't attack or block. {4}: Attach Heping's Armistice Chains to target creature you don't control. {8}: Gain control of equipped creature.

card.name: Liao, Seto's Shield
card.text: {X}{W}{W}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn. Whenever damage is prevented this way, you gain that much life.

card.name: Cai Lan, the Chained
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Cai Lan, the Chained perseveres, exile target creature an opponent controls until Cai Lan leaves the battlefield. (A creature perseveres when it survives damage.)

card.name: Acabo, the Fabled Falcon
card.text: Flying Whenever Acabo, the Fabled Falcon attacks, you choose how up to one target creature an opponent controls blocks this turn.

card.name: Commander of the Folded Fan
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.

card.name: Noble Fall
card.text: Exile target creature. Each player gains life equal to that creature's toughness. Metamorph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up and cast it at any time for its metamorph cost.)

card.name: Ancestral Shrine
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.") {5}{W}{W}, Sacrifice three Idols: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Mamei, Benevolent Tyrant
card.text: Whenever a non-Serf creature you control enters, create a 0/1 black Serf creature token. Sacrifice a Serf: Target creature you control gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Orichi of the Cold Mist
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying When Orichi of the Cold Mist enters, exile another target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Kan'Gi, the Reverent
card.text: Whenever Kan'Gi, the Reverent perseveres, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to Kan'Gi's power. (A creature perseveres when it survives damage.)

card.name: Shara, the Last Leviathan
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Shimmering Veil
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature. Metamorph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up and cast it at any time for its metamorph cost.)

card.name: Strike Out
card.text: Counter three target spells.

card.name: Swelling Sea
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a flood counter on Swelling Sea, then return each nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to the number of flood counters on Swelling Sea to its owner's hand.

card.name: Xing, the Lucky Charm
card.text: Flash This spell can't be countered. When Xing, the Lucky Charm enters, draw three cards. {U}{R}, Discard three cards: Return Xing from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ha'Eng, Figure of Greed
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent owns dies, exile the top two cards of that player's library face down. For as long as those cards remain exiled, you may look at them, you may cast them, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast them.

card.name: Hui Zhou, the Dark Visage
card.text: Menace Whenever Hui Zhou, the Dark Visage perseveres, you may destroy another target legendary creature. (A creature perseveres when it survives damage.)

card.name: Kai'Wej, the Desolate
card.text: Flying Kai'Wej, the Desolate has indestructible as long as you control no other creatures. {1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return Kai'Wej from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Dark Rite Cultist
card.text: {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life, Discard a card, Sacrifice Dark Rite Cultist and another creature: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.

card.name: Malefic Portal
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Metamorph {B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up and cast it at any time for its metamorph cost.)

card.name: Crippling Fear
card.text: Choose one or both— • Target creature has base toughness 1 until end of turn. • Remove all but one loyalty counter from target planeswalker.

card.name: Hayuan, the Misjudged
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, sacrifice Hayuan, the Misjudged if that player controls a creature with power 2 or less. When Hayuan dies, create X Idol tokens, where X is the number of creatures you control. (They're artifacts with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Zhenya, the Draconic
card.text: Menace Ferocious — Whenever Zhenya, the Draconic becomes blocked by a creature, it deals 3 damage to that creature if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Sugon, Destruction's Fist
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever Sugon, Destruction's Fist deals combat damage to a player, return it to its owner's hand unless you have Sugon deal 5 damage to you.

card.name: Fang, the Lavaclasm
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Fang, the Lavaclasm enters or attacks, it deals 2 damage to each other creature.

card.name: Abrupt Explosion
card.text: Abrupt Explosion deals X damage to any target. Metamorph {X}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up and cast it at any time for its metamorph cost.)

card.name: Heathen Rise
card.text: Shuffle your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Heathen Rise deals damage to you equal to the number of cards revealed this way. Ferocious — That creature gains haste if it has power 4 or greater.

card.name: Hasty Assault
card.text: Discard your hand. Creatures you control get +X/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn, where X is the number of cards discarded this way.

card.name: Duan, the Fabled Rider
card.text: Double strike {3}{R}{W}: Create Hao'Tai's Blessing, a legendary red and white Aura enchantment token with enchant creature and "Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying" and attach it to Duan, the Fabled Rider.

card.name: Xira, Scatterer of Seeds
card.text: Ferocious — Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater you control enters, untap all lands you control.

card.name: Heyu, Immortal Hunter
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Heyu, Immortal Hunter. Whenever Heyu becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it if Heyu has the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield.

card.name: Shuye, Forever Watching
card.text: Vigilance Shuye, Forever Watching's power and toughness are each equal to the number of noncreature permanents you don't control.

card.name: Avatar of the Natural
card.text: Reach, trample If a +1/+1 counter would be put on another creature you control, instead put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and on Avatar of the Natural.

card.name: Hunter's Instinct
card.text: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, Hunter's Instinct deals damage to target creature equal to the revealed card's power. Ferocious — If the revealed card is a creature card with power 4 or greater, put it into your hand.

card.name: Challenge Authority
card.text: Whenever a permanent enters under an opponent's control, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card that shares a type with that permanent, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Gui, the Islandbringer
card.text: Hexproof, trample Whenever Gui, the Islandbringer deals combat damage to an opponent, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Ing'Wei's Crystal Top
card.text: {3}, {T}: Put Ing'Wei's Crystal Top on top of your library. Scry 3, then draw a card.

card.name: Temporary Armory
card.text: Temporary Armory enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Temporary Armory becomes equipped to a creature, move a +1/+1 counter from Temporary Armory to that creature. Equipped creature has first strike. Equip {2}

card.name: Aquatic Refuge
card.text: As Aquatic Refuge enters, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you don't, Aquatic Refuge enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Toxic Spring
card.text: As Toxic Spring enters, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you don't, Toxic Spring enters tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Sunless Ridge
card.text: As Sunless Ridge enters, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you don't, Sunless Ridge enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Scorched Copse
card.text: As Scorched Copse enters, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you don't, Scorched Copse enters tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Prairie Monastery
card.text: As Prairie Monastery enters, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you don't, Prairie Monastery enters tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Inspirited Duelist
card.text: Inspirited Duelist has double strike as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.text: Defender, lifelink

card.name: Swift Savior
card.text: Flash When Swift Savior enters, if you control a legendary creature, you may have Swift Savior deal 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.text: Whenever Essence Rehabilitator perseveres, you may return target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (A creature perseveres when it survives damage.)

card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast as long as you've sacrificed an Idol this turn.

card.name: Circumspect Flock
card.text: Flying Whenever Circumspect Flock perseveres, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying. (A creature perseveres when it survives damage.) (A creature perseveres when it survives damage.)

card.name: Foxflame
card.text: Foxflame deals 4 damage divided as you choose among up to one target attacking creature and up to one target blocking creature.

card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. Create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.text: Target creature you control gets +0/+6 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn. Untap it.

card.text: When Astute Prophet enters, draw a card. If you control a legendary creature, draw two cards instead.

card.name: Wadepool Frog
card.text: Whenever Wadepool Frog attacks, it gains flying until end of turn.

card.text: When Woken Wave dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target card from your graveyard to the battlefield face down.

card.text: Draw four cards. Metamorph {3}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up and cast it at any time for its metamorph cost.)

card.text: Counter target spell. If you control a Wizard, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Dimensional Plunge
card.text: Put target creature into its owner's library third from the top.

card.name: Patient Orchestration
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, sacrifice Patient Orchestration. If you do, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's mana value. Put up to two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.text: Lifelink Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, you may pay {1}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.text: Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Lifeblood Leecher, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.text: Target opponent discards a card. If a creature card was discarded this way, that player loses 3 life. If a land card was discarded this way, add {B}{B}. If a noncreature, nonland card was discarded this way, draw a card.

card.name: Dessication Ritual
card.text: Target opponent loses 1 life for each creature they control. You gain 2 life for each Wizard you control.

card.name: Skirmish Scars

card.text: Blazing Beam deals 4 damage to any target.

card.text: Destroy target creature. If you control a Wizard, put up to one target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Robe of Shadows
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Haunting Illusion
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-3.

card.name: Worshipper Whelp
card.text: Ferocious — At the beginning of each combat, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Worshipper Whelp gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Slippery Salamander
card.text: {1}{R}: Target creature can't block Slippery Salamander this turn.

card.name: Dragon Initiate
card.text: Defender, flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Dragon Initiate gets +2/+0 and loses defender until end of turn.

card.name: Draconic Aspirant
card.text: {R}: Draconic Aspirant gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Canyon Agamid
card.text: Trample Canyon Agamid can't block creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Simian Striker
card.text: Whenever Simian Striker attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hurtling Swine
card.text: Hurtling Swine attacks each combat if able.

card.name: Dazzling Display
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn. Metamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up and cast it at any time for its metamorph cost.)

card.name: Perimeter Siege
card.text: Exile target land. Create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Akimbo Slash
card.text: Akimbo Slash deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures. Ferocious — Those creatures can't block this turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Heated Dispute
card.text: Heated Dispute deals 3 damage to any target. Ferocious — This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Concentrated Blast
card.text: Concentrated Blast deals 5 damage to target creature.

card.name: Tormenting Voice
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

card.name: Vigorous Dryad
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Another target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Impressible Cub
card.text: Ferocious — At the beginning of each combat, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Impressible Cub gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Elder Rootwallas
card.text: {3}{G}: Elder Rootwallas gets +4/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Golden Grizzly
card.text: When Golden Grizzly enters, create an Idol token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.")

card.name: Canopy Ratstalker
card.text: When Canopy Ratstalker enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Tunnel Web Spider
card.text: Reach, deathtouch

card.name: Contentious Yak
card.text: Trample When Contentious Yak enters, another target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Immaculate Attunement
card.text: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among any number of creatures you control. Metamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up and cast it at any time for its metamorph cost.)

card.name: Fierce Howl
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Ferocious — You may cast Fierce Howl as though it had flash if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Organic Corrosion
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value 3 or less. Ferocious — You gain 4 life if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Arbalest Barrage
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

card.name: Beast Hunt
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Child of the Pack
card.text: Enchant creature When Child of the Pack enters, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Wolf you control.

card.name: Sinister Saber
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has menace. Equip {2}

card.name: Barreling Chariot
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each permanent attached to it and has trample. Equip {4}

card.name: Vial of Ice
card.text: Vial of Ice enters tapped. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Vial of Ice: Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: No-Man's Land
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice No-Man's Land: Draw a card.
